com.sap.spe.conversion

Interface IConversionProduct

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPricingProduct, ISPCDocumentProduct, ISPCProduct, ISPEProduct

    public interface IConversionProduct
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface to product master from the point of view of the Conversion Engine.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns:
        the product ID.

      • getExternalId

        java.lang.String getExternalId()
        Returns:
        gets the external identifier

        java.lang.String getObjectFamily()
        Returns:
        gets the object family

      • getDescription

        java.lang.String getDescription()
        Parameters:
        locale - locale of user for language dependent description and also as language of error messages which might occur
        Returns:
        a description for the product. This description is displayed on the graphical user interface for the pricing conditions.

      • getBaseUnit

        IQuantityUnit getBaseUnit()
                   throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                          ConversionInconsistentDataException
        Returns:
        the base unit of measure of the product. This is necessary for quantity conversion.
        Throws:
        ConversionMissingDataException - should be thrown if the base unit of measure is not found in the database. (It would make sense to use the method newQuantityUnit of the ConversionEngine).
        ConversionInconsistentDataException

      • getAlternativeUnitConversionFraction

        Fraction getAlternativeUnitConversionFraction(IQuantityUnit targetUnit)
        Parameters:
        targetUnit - alternative unit related to a product
        Returns:
        the fraction for the conversion from base quantity unit to the target unit. It consists of numerator, denominator and exponent

      • addAlternativeUnitToFractionMapping

        void addAlternativeUnitToFractionMapping(java.lang.String alternativeUnitName,
                                         int numerator,
                                         int denominator,
                                         int exponent)
                                  throws ConversionMissingDataException
        Add an alternative unit of measure with the corresponding conversion fraction to me.
        Throws:
        ConversionMissingDataException

      • getAlternativeUnitConversionFractions

        IAlternativeUnitFraction[] getAlternativeUnitConversionFractions()
        Returns:
        a vector of IAlternativeUnitFractions( a map of alternative unit names and fractions) for conversions between the base unit and all alternative units.

      • getAvailableQuantityUnits

        IPhysicalUnit[] getAvailableQuantityUnits()
        Returns:
        a vector of IQuantityUnits which contains the base unit of measure and alternative units of measure for the conversion product.

      • containsUnit

        boolean containsUnit(IPhysicalUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        unit - a physical unit
        Returns:
        true, if unitName is the name of the base unit of measure or an alternative unit of measure of the product.
